import React from 'react' import {FcDeleteDatabase} from 'react-icons/fc' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' const CartItem = ({item,itemIndex}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const removeFromCart = () => { dispatch(remove()) } return (

{item.title}

{item.discription}

{item.price}

) } export default CartItem
